A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lover of the Star Wars franchise I have to say this is the weakest film BY FAR (yes\, I'd prefer to sit down to another viewing of Episode One than see this again). The film is dogged by terrible pacing as the director attempts to super-impose a bizarre\, non-threatening chase narrative over a series of virtually unconnected set-pieces\, some of which further plot but many just wasting the audiences time. \n\nThe directors lack of experience with a film of this budget unfortunately shows alongside a clear case of too many cooks in the kitchen. Disappointing.
